thread.title: Vince Vaughn Insults Robert Downey Jr. While Talking to Kids About What They're Thankful For
thread.title_full: Vince Vaughn Insults Robert Downey Jr. While Talking to Kids About What They're Thankful For

author: Caitlin Hacker
title: Vince Vaughn Insults Robert Downey Jr. While Talking to Kids About What They're Thankful For
text:
Vince Vaughn Asks Kids What They're Thankful For on Ellen Vince Vaughn Insults Robert Downey Jr. While Talking to Kids About What They're Thankful For November 18, 2016 by Caitlin Hacker 28 Shares 
Vince Vaughn stopped by The Ellen DeGeneres Show on Friday, but instead of sitting down for a regular interview, he decided to talk to a group of kids about what they're thankful for this year. After the actor , who is currently sporting a buzz cut for a new movie role, sat down with the kids, one boy thought his name was Prince Vaughn. "Price Vaughn? I like that. I like where your head's at," he said. In addition to asking them who their favorite celebrity is (and hilariously bashing Robert Downey Jr. in the process), he also scolded them for not seeing some if his biggest movies. The kids then revealed that they're thankful for their family and friends, to which Vince responded, "Boring, but OK." Watch the video above to see their hilarious chat, which includes Vince offering them some solid gambling advice. Related:
